methods.name: test_specgram_warn_only1seg
methods.docstring: Warning should be raised if len(x) <= NFFT.

methods.name: test_specgram_auto_default_psd_equal
methods.docstring:
Test that mlab.specgram without mode and with mode 'default' and 'psd'
are all the same.

methods.name: test_no_data
methods.docstring: Pass no data into the GaussianKDE class.

methods.name: test_single_dataset_element
methods.docstring: Pass a single dataset element into the GaussianKDE class.

methods.name: test_silverman_multidim_dataset
methods.docstring: Test silverman's for a multi-dimensional array.

methods.name: test_silverman_singledim_dataset
methods.docstring: Test silverman's output for a single dimension list.

methods.name: test_scott_multidim_dataset
methods.docstring: Test scott's output for a multi-dimensional array.

methods.name: test_scott_singledim_dataset
methods.docstring: Test scott's output a single-dimensional array.

methods.name: test_scalar_empty_dataset
methods.docstring: Test the scalar's cov factor for an empty array.

methods.name: test_callable_covariance_dataset
methods.docstring: Test the callable's cov factor for a multi-dimensional array.

methods.name: test_callable_singledim_dataset
methods.docstring: Test the callable's cov factor for a single-dimensional array.

methods.name: test_wrong_bw_method
methods.docstring: Test the error message that should be called when bw is invalid.

methods.name: test_evaluate_diff_dim
methods.docstring:
Test the evaluate method when the dim's of dataset and points have
different dimensions.

methods.name: test_evaluate_inv_dim
methods.docstring:
Invert the dimensions; i.e., for a dataset of dimension 1 [3, 2, 4],
the points should have a dimension of 3 [[3], [2], [4]].

methods.name: test_evaluate_dim_and_num
methods.docstring: Tests if evaluated against a one by one array
